items.name: mappanel-with-actions
items.title: Action
items.description: A GeoExt.Action is created to insert an OpenLayers control in a toolbar as a button or in a menu as a menu item.

items.name: simple-app
items.title: MVC Application
items.description: A simple complete MVC application example called CF (Cartography Framework).

items.name: geocoder
items.title: Geocoder
items.description: Creates a combo box that handles results from a geocoding service. By default it uses OSM Nominatim.

items.name: feature-grid
items.title: Freature Grid
items.description: An Ext.grid.Panel loaded with features read from a GeoJSON document.

items.name: layer-opacity-slider
items.title: Layer Opacity Slider
items.description: The LayerOpacitySlider allows control of a layer opacity using an Ext.Slider.

items.name: legend-panel
items.title: Legend Panel
items.description: Create a LegendPanel that is autopopulated with legends from a map that has already been created.

items.name: map-panel
items.title: MapPanel
items.description: Create a simple GeoExt.panel.Map container for a map.

items.name: permalink
items.title: Permalink
items.description: Generate permalinks with the current map position and visible layers.

items.name: popup
items.title: Popup
items.description: A popup is a specialized window that supports anchoring to a particular location in a MapPanel.

items.name: print-extent
items.title: Print Extent
items.description: Set the bounds of a printable PDF interactively with a dynamic print extent rectangle. It requires the MapFish or GeoServer print module.

items.name: print-form
items.title: Print Form
items.description: Set the bounds of a printable PDF interactively with a dynamic print extent rectangle. It requires the MapFish or GeoServer print module.

items.name: print-page
items.title: Print Page
items.description: Create a printable PDF, using the MapFish or GeoServer print module.

items.name: print-preview
items.title: Print Preview
items.description: How to create a printable PDF with GeoExt.data.MapfishPrintProvider and GeoExt.PrintMapPanel.

items.name: renderer
items.title: Renderer
items.description: The FeatureRenderer renderers arbitrary OpenLayers.Feature.Vector objects given a list of symbolizers.

items.name: style-grid
items.title: Style Grid
items.description: The StyleReader populates a store with records representing rules of a Style or the entries of a ColorMap, so they can easily be shown in a grid.

items.name: layer-tree
items.title: Layer Tree
items.description: This example shows how to work with a layer tree.

items.name: wfs-capabilities
items.title: WFS Capabilities
items.description: Load a grid with data from a WFS capabilities document.

items.name: wms-capabilities
items.title: WMS Capabilities
items.description: Load a grid with data from a WMS capabilities document.

items.name: zoom-chooser
items.title: Zoom Chooser
items.description: This example demonstrates the use of a GeoExt.data.ScaleStore to list the available zoom levels for a map.

items.name: zoom-slider
items.title: Zoom Slider
items.description: Allows control of the map scale using an Ext.slider.SingleSlider.
